result.reason: Useful feature request for command snippets that paste/execute predefined shell commands in active SSH sessions, labeled In Development upstream with Medium priority
result.approach: Add a CommandSnippet model class with name+command+autoExecute properties, a UI panel listing snippets with add/edit/delete, and a send mechanism that pastes text into the active SSH/console connection via SendKeys or equivalent protocol API

attempts.raw_output:
This is a feature request for adding a command snippet/library to send pre-configured commands to SSH/Console sessions.
